name: TM Corporation (Pty)
product_desc:
TM Corp buys and install solar systems for homes, commercial properties and other properties; solar power systems, solar water heating systems, solar street lighting, solar water pumping and other solar technologies.
With problems such high massive electricity cuts, high electrical costs, low productivity due scarcity of infrastructure such as electricity and the problem of climate change, TM Corp intervenes to address, mitigates and combats this challenges for the betterment of Lesotho Economy. We are targeting Households, commercial properties, Government building, real estates developers and other properties with our country as one of the countries with most sunlight.

name: hiAfrica
product_desc: hiAfrica strives to mimic the way in which life, in general, plays out in Africa.
high_concept: A social network that understands Africa
markets: Mobile Commerce, Mobile Advertising, Travel & Tourism

name: Choose Vision Footwear
product_desc: Style #1; Men's Casual Walking Shoe-- Design and develop a new men's walking shoe incorporating SEMIC Footwear Technology. The design willl be on trend with styles that are currently in the market place, however the technology will also have to be visible and stand out. It is very important that the technology is visually appealing to support its function and bring more value to the product. Overall our goal is to create the first shoe for the Choose Vision Footwear brand to evolve with new styles and improved technologies.
high_concept: A revolutionary sole system which compromises a hollow rubber sole.
markets: Women-Focused, Wearables For Seniors / Kids, Men's Apparel and Accessories

name: Orgunite
product_desc:
Orgunite is an integrated cloud communication and collaboration platform for teams and individuals in real-time. It aims to leverage the best computing platforms and technologies to provide the world’s best cloud collaboration platform for teams and individuals. Enhancing true value to both teams and individuals. It has been designed to fulfill these five important design goals:

Security – Designed to be a secure, safe, and reliable platform for both user identification and business data.
Scalability - Designed to handle and process growing and massive amounts of data - from millions to petabytes of data.
Real-time – Designed to give an update as and when it happens to millions of users.
Performance – Designed to offer the lowest response time and maximizing productivity of the team 
User Experience – Designed to be usable and valuable to the user and business.
high_concept: A cloud collaboration platform for you, your team and customers in real-time

name: Think Tank Entreprenuers (PTY) LTD
product_desc:
We Conduct research and engage in advocacy in areas such as social policy, political strategy, economy, Health, science or technology, innovation, education issues, industrial or business policies advice. We are hailed as "one of the main policy actors in democratic societies, assuring apluralistic, open and accountable process of policy analysis, Scientific research, decision-making and evaluation
Our Global vehicle in our business is a business innovation utility that aims to use Media, Communications and Interactive Networking and innovative Creativity in general as tools to liven up the business and work experience and make business practice principles more accessible to all sectors of society.


- We are having over 20 years experience in the field of Biomedical sciences and business.
- We are registered HEALTH NCP promoting EU HORIZON 2020
- We do business consulting
high_concept: MEDICAL, LABORATORY, HIGH TECH EQUIPMENT SALES AND MARKETING, RESEARCH INNOVATION., SEO

name: HERITAGE
product_desc: We are developing a web based platform through web, mobile site and app for Africans and alike to purchase the latest in African fashion not only from designer but also from already existing retail stores without a hustle.

name: SharpFede Communicator
product_desc: SharpFede Communicator is a mobile communication application that centralizes all communication mediums on one device and links them to a user’s mobile number.  Unlike the competition, SharpFede has an extremely intuitive user interface, has a familiar SMS-based curation style, is comparatively small in size, incorporates standard social features that have largely been ignored and can be installed on virtually any device/appliance that has an interactive display panel.
high_concept: Unifies all communication mediums on one mobile number and curates data on the SMS model
markets: Lotteries, Communications Infrastructure, Mobile Payments, P2P Money Transfer
status: @SharpFede has been chosen to pitch at @Sbootcamp 's Pitch Day in Amsterdam on the 19th of June! #SBCpitchdays
